name: ziit
description: Ziit is a self-hosted link-in-bio and profile page generator. It lets users collect links, social profiles, and content into a single customizable landing page hosted on their own infrastructure.
features: Link aggregation: Collect all your important links, social profiles, and content in one customizable landing page.
Custom themes: Personalize your profile page with colors, fonts, and layouts that match your personal brand.
Analytics tracking: Monitor link clicks and visitor statistics to understand which content resonates with your audience.
Social integration: Display links to Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other social platforms with recognizable icons.
Custom domains: Host your link page on your own domain instead of a shared platform subdomain.
Link scheduling: Set specific dates when links should appear or disappear from your profile automatically.
Priority ordering: Arrange links in custom order to highlight the most important content at the top.
Rich media: Add images, videos, and embedded content alongside text links for engaging presentations.
SEO optimization: Configure meta tags, descriptions, and Open Graph data for better social media sharing.
Mobile responsive: Ensure your link page looks great on all devices with automatic responsive design.
Privacy control: Keep your profile private or public, and optionally require passwords for access.
Export functionality: Download your link configuration for backup or migration to other platforms.
